Well...this was stupid from beginning to the end.

It's worth noting that whilst many see "Apocalypse" as being synonymous with armageddon, it isn't.

Religion seems to have shifted the meaning to mean global destruction, same as many have done with the 2012 date.

The Mayan 2012 date and end of the long calander of ages has involvement of cosmological/galactic dynamics which are causing some global changes and changes in the Sol system, which our species influences are worsening on Terra and causing to accelerate phenomenon above natures curves and putting our species in greater danger, this is true, but end of the world it ain't, not yet anyways.

Apocalypse is actually revelation, an unveiling or as in the Greek etymology "lifting the veil" to greater understanding etc.

The world is not going to end in 2012.


If it was, a great many people who are Oraculum would already know, there are many oracles alive today as in every generation of the past, that isn't the case, yes some thngs are not good but it's not the end, nowhere near it so don't get fearful about all the end of days nonsense out there, as throughout history, there are people who can see these things and in sharper focus the nearer to supposed events, that isn't the case, end of days is more senseless worry and paranoia, FUD.

Peace. : )

Great series!  And we the people need to be aware of all the dark doings of the dark hats.  And if all is brought into the light of awareness, hopefully the dark hats will pack up with their secrets and lies and leave us the heck alone!

Great job in restoring the correct aspect ratio and bringing this series to us...it's much appreciated by me as I don't have access to watching this program!

Yes I agree with DeltaPan on this point, that 2012 is NOT about fear, destruction and endings...but is all about tipping the scales towards increasing enlightenment, conscious awareness and unconditional love flowing through us and causing a general upliftment out of the dark energies caused by the dark hats that this series attempted to expose.

I applaud this series as it brings to light all the deceit, lies and dark intentions of the ones who want to control us.  And this needs to happen so the dark hats can be given fair justice for their crimes, and so that the rest of us can move past this into greater enlightenment, truth and love.

PEACE!
